text: Richard Steel (born 13 March 1930) is an English former professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for Bristol City and York City, and in non-League football for Ferryhill Athletic, Merthyr Tydfil and Chippenham Town. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sedgefield Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Ferryhill Athletic F.C. players Category:Bristol City F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:Merthyr Tydfil F.C. players Category:Chippenham Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Dick Steel
